word: Effective Personal Work in Italy.--It is not always pleasant for our brethren to live where the people need help most; but their labors would often be  productive of far more good if they would do so. They ought to come close to the people, sit with them at their tables, and lodge in their humble homes. The laborers may have to take their families to places not at all desirable; but they should remember that Jesus did not remain in the most desirable places. He came down to earth that He might help those who needed help.--Historical Sketches, p. 148. (1886)
